name: Fit
description: Fit Club is an innovative, fully on-chain game built on the Base, offering players the chance to own and customize unique characters. In this play-to-earn ecosystem, players can compete against others to earn a larger share of the ETH generated within the game. What sets Fit Club apart is its dynamic, evolving art. The character art and its elements are entirely on-chain and transform based on the player’s progress. As players improve their in-game fitness levels, their characters' appearances change in real-time, reflecting their enhanced physiques and overall fitness journey. It’s an engaging and visually immersive experience where art and gaming mechanics evolve together, providing a fresh and rewarding gameplay experience for players looking to earn while staying active.
